title: Beaded Slippers with Peacock Motif

  object_colour: multicolored

  physical_appearance: This is a pair of beaded slippers. The face of the slippers in the front features a peacock
 standing upon a branch with flowers in full bloom. The slippers have a low heel.

  subject_terms_1: flowers (motifs) Peranakan birds (motifs) embroidery (visual works) footwear

  subject_terms_2: Motifs Embroidery Peranakan (Asian people) Women\u0027s shoes

  subject_terms_3: Peranakan costumes

  sgcool_label_text: The beaded face of this kasot manek depicts a peacock standing upon a branch with flowers in full bloom. A printed mark ‘122…Beaded Slip…’ is visible on the insole. The heel is low. The popularity of the kasot manek was firmly established by the 1920s. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
